ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: punched, hit, kicked, pushed or shoved me, on purpose.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Forced me to do something I did not want to do.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Told me others would not like me if I did not do what they said.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Damaged, hid, or stole my belongings, on purpose.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Called me mean or hurtful names.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Said mean or hurtful things to me.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Left me out of a group or an activity, or did not allow me to join in, on purpose.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully offline/face-to-face: Spread lies or rumors about me, to hurt me or make others not like me.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully online/on the internet or mobile phones: Called me mean or hurtful names.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully online/on the internet or mobile phones: Sent or posted, mean or hurtful pictures/videos about me.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully online/on the internet or mobile phones: Told me others would not like me if I did not do what they said.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully online/on the internet or mobile phones: Left me out of a group or an activity, or did not allow me to join in, on purpose.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more

ElementDescription: In the past 3 months, how many times has a bully online/on the internet or mobile phones: Spread lies or rumors about me, to hurt me or make others not like me.
Notes: 0= This did not happen to me, 1= Once or twice, 2= Every few weeks, 3= About once a week, 4= Several times a week or more
